Title: Mommy's Bosses (2)
Plot: 7 of the 4400 have died and Maia gets worse all the time Out of suspicion and despair Diana threatens Dr. Hudson with a gun. Lily has run away with Isabelle and Richard pleads he to come back. Marsdem seems unable to avoid a long prison term which makes Alison contact Kyle.
GuestStars: Tom Verica,  Keegan Connor Tracy,  Jonah  Bay,  Nancy Sorel,  Christie Wilkes,  Christie Laing
